alert.note: Alert for Accomack; Northampton (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 10:17PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Accomack and north central Northampton Counties through 1115 PM EDT... At 1017 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking scattered strong thunderstorms near Exmore, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Exmore around 1025 PM EDT. Onancock around 1100 PM EDT. Onley around 1105 PM EDT. Parksley around 1115 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Harborton, Melfa, Jamesville, Wachapreague, Wardtown, Accomac, Locustville, Modest Town, Pungoteague and Painter. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM EDT for eastern and southeastern Virginia.
